name: Access Denied
summary: Access Denied is a puzzle game in the world where for storage of personal data are used special device in the form of protected boxes. Imagine yourself in the role of the professional cracker of such devices and test your skills for 36 different levels.
info:
• 中文名: 拒绝访问

  • 平台: Xbox One
